original_text: So I must take their gift safely to the Christians in Jerusalem. When I have finished that job, I will come to visit you. Then I will continue my journey to Spain. So I must take their gift safely to the Christians in Jerusalem. When I have finished that job, I will come to visit you. Then I will continue my journey to Spain.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 이 일을 마치고 이 열매를 그들에게 확증한 후에 너희에게 들렀다가 서바나로 가리라

sentences.original_text: So I must take their gift safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그들의 선물을 안전하게 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: When I have finished that job
I will come to visit you
Then I will continue my journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 내 여행을 계속할 것입니다
